songs.title: Niggaz
songs.lyrics: I don't like yo nigga he said I'm his sister he said he my mister he strong like some liquor I'm sweet like some sugar we are so different he said he want my body and all my figures. Yo nigga is so fake fuck niggas I do hate. a nigga don't know who he messing with a nigga gone be in a shake. a nigga can be so scared cuz a nigga don't know what he heard. you a fuck nigga that a fact,a nigga gone scurry like a cat
